documentation.title: Comma After Last Array Item
documentation.standard: <<<<<<< HEAD For single-line arrays, there should be no comma after the last array item. However, for multi-line arrays, there should be a comma after the last array item.

code.title: Valid: Single-line array without a comma after the last item.

code_comparison.code: ======= For single-line arrays, there should be no comma after the last array item. However, for multi-line arrays, there should be a comma after the last array item. ]]> >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) $args = array(1, 2, 3); <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) $args = array(1, 2, 3, ); <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) $args = [ 1 => 'foo', 2 => 'bar', ]; <<<<<<< HEAD ======= >>>>>>> ddb2375 (fix: console error) $args = [ 1 => 'foo', 2 => 'bar' ];
